snippet.title: DKC X Mario Trailer
snippet.description:
Download the patch here:
v1.107
https://romhackplaza.org/romhacks/dkc-x-mario-snes/

Be sure to patch an unheadered U 1.0 ROM of DKC! This was made in DKC. If you stream, please use the Donkey Kong directory.

Features
Here is the doc I made outlining the many features of this.
https://docs.google.com/document/d/18rmtQjF1AWjeXNTq1qkt3EwBQC0yIunmiyU3IQN9kKQ/edit?usp=sharing



Footage mostly from Fathlo, Shoujo, and Skybilz
https://www.twitch.tv/fathlo23
https://www.twitch.tv/shoujo
https://www.twitch.tv/skybilz

I also updated my editor to fully work with this!
https://github.com/mike19283/RainbowZ-Editor

I'm working on another doc with a simplified explanation of how everything was done here!


1.107
http://www.mediafire.com/view/blza8jdwq467a20/DKC%20X%20Mario%201.107.zip



==========================================================
There are much better players of DKC on Twitch! Check them out! Also, look at http://www.dkcspeedruns.com for various trick explanations.


Playlists:
My DKC Mods
https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLUWjFHos30VebaTlZ8AG8kdlcGNArGSex

J Hacks
https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLUWjFHos30VdeCZjI1-MrzyrvgFoCvzB-

Links:
DKC: Chaos Edition 2.0
https://www.youtube.com/shorts/gawsb2z7ZjY
DKC: Enemy Rando
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=z8FrsRuJfZk
DKC: Warmup ROM
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=u9pwCGU-Wr0
DKC: Pacifist Mode
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7NSk1gZVunw
DKC: All KONG Letters
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vm9W6JR1T2A
DKC: Entrance Randomizer
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=o2Vu0TL-m6g
DKC2: Entrance Randomizer
https://www.romhacking.net/utilities/1487/

RainbowZ Editor - https://github.com/mike19283/RainbowZ-Editor Check out my DKC editor!
Also, here is a link to my quickstart guide: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vwIS8L7Kek4


I (very rarely) stream! Check out my profile for randomizers, hacks, and more! https://www.twitch.tv/rainbowsprinklez

Check out my hack discord! https://discord.gg/qSYRzMqD4F
If you want to get in touch with me, drop me a dm on discord :)

Thank you all for watching! Stay safe! Please consider gently pressing that sub button. Everyone wants to smash it. That's mean. Idc about monetizing. I  only care about subs.

=================================================
Check out my links at https://linktr.ee/sprink
